title: Introduction
subTitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
transcript: Use Xamarin.Forms built in pages, layouts, and controls to build and design mobile apps from a single API that is highly extensible. Subclass any control to customize their behavior or define your own controls, layouts, pages, and cells to make your app pixel perfect.
